The `mtime` of the source file.
<prop type="Array" name="hash"> The analysis array containing strings with internal, external and built-in dependencies and their versions.

The `mtime` of when the entry file was changed.
<prop type="Array" name="hash"> The analysis array that is used for comparison and user-friendly display of what dependencies changed.
The `md5` of the hash array.
